     sure. the origin of life was a long time ago. it's gonna be pretty hard to be totally sure how it happened

     are you blind

     i used to use staff paper but now i use audio recordings and text files together

     that is literally impossible

     oh that would explain a lot

     you

3.22.20  1:45 am   how do i ask questions?

     impossible. it can't be done

3.22.20  1:23 am   I want to buy a pen tablet for digital drawing, do you think the "One by Wacom" is as good as the Intuos?

     well, the problem i'm having with the intuos on mac os 10.14 is that it just doesn't stay connected. While i'm drawing it stays connected, but let's say i do some other things (not drawing), maybe have lunch, go to bed, etc etc etc. Then, when i go to draw again, ok it's time to draw i would like to draw now please, ... it just does not work. I am specifically talking about wired mode (forget bluetooth). The only reliable way to make the thing work is to log out and log in again, you have to do this each time you want to start drawing on a new day basically. i am pretty disappointed because it is supposed to be a high quality tablet which is pretty expensive. The only other wacom experience i had was with the 2012 wacom bamboo which i was using on mac os 10.6.8, for years and years, and worked perfectly, always, any time i needed it. Besides this, another side note which i have learned about a graphics tablet is i think i have concluded that a small tablet is actually better. unless it has an actual display on it in which case larger would be better but that's almost a different product entirely, and a very different price range, more comparable to an ipad or touch laptop

3.22.20  1:22 am   Hi, I'm drunk again, sorry, I'll be like this alotxthrough martial law.

Anyways, & I know it's not the time, but when you do press a 2-disk vinyl for what you determine how be your first album over your 40-ish track portfolio,

     it would have to be a seriously strange apocalypse for me to use vinyl records. like the internet would have to be gone completely, and all computers would have to be gone as well as CDs

      you want master files wherein the lower-mids/bass/sub is all mixed center channel. It's a limitation of the format, otherwise the needle will skid off track or distort the music.  This should be in a 24-bit 48k or higher, even if the original masters were 16-bit 42k. If the factory only accepts audio cd masters, run the fuck away.

Seriously, even pre-orders would get you, personally, through the next year.

Or, you can do cassette ie Can I Borrow A Feeling?

     reading back over your question again, i'm thinking you might have no idea who i am, but that's ok

3.22.20  1:06 am   When your new stuff begins releasing will some of us think back to the question and answers we've read on this page and be amazed by our own shortsightedness having not realised that what we wanted was right under our noses the whole time?

     sort of but i don't blame you for not expecting it
